StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Children's Hospital of Philadelphia Genome-wide Association Study of Conotruncal Cardiac Malformations

Policy.acknowledgement_statement:
The CTD dataset was obtained as part of a study entitled: Genome Wide Studies of Conotruncal Cardiac Defects (HL098844) as well as a Special Center of Clinically Oriented Research in Pediatric Cardiology, Genetic Mechanisms in Pediatric Heart Disease, project title Genotype and Clinical Outcome in Conotruncal Defects (HL062177 & HL74731) funded by the NHLBI, and the National Center for Research Resources (UL1RR024134), which is now the National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences (UL1TR000003).
Acknowledgement: We acknowledge data generation supported by NIH grants: HL062177, HL74731, HL098844 from the NIH, National Heart, Lung and Blood Insitute, and the National Center for Research Resources, UL1RR024134, which is now the National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, UL1TR000003. Genotyping for the GWAS was funded by an Institutional Development Fund to The Center for Applied Genomics from The Children’s Hospital of Philadelphia. The content is solely the responsibility of the authors and does not necessarily represent the official views of the NIH.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

StudyTo.name: NHLBI Big Data Analysis Heart Failure Challenge Data Collection
